meanings.definition: Having multiple estrous cycles in a year.
meanings.sent1: The rabbit was polyestrous, meaning she could have babies several times in a year.
meanings.sent2: The polyestrous cat was always ready to mate throughout the year.
meanings.sent3: The polyestrous hamster kept surprising the other animals with her frequent pregnancies.
meanings.sent4: Her polyestrous nature was like a never-ending cycle of new beginnings.
meanings.sent5: The farm was full of polyestrous animals, creating a lively and bustling environment.

meanings.definition: An animal that has multiple estrous cycles in a year.
meanings.sent1: The polyestrous in the barn were always in demand for breeding purposes.
meanings.sent2: The polyestrous in the zoo were carefully monitored by the keepers.
meanings.sent3: The polyestrous happily hopped around the farm, spreading joy with their frequent pregnancies.
meanings.sent4: The polyestrous were like the busy bees of the animal kingdom, always on the move.
meanings.sent5: The polyestrous were a valuable asset to the breeding program, ensuring a continuous cycle of new offspring.
